name: FPS Survival Zombies Game 3D
description:
FPS Survival Zombie Game is an innovative OFFLINE 3D survival shooter with only one purpose: kill them all!

This game features high and realistic graphics and is fun and easy to play!

You are left to survive in a forest full of mad zombies and animals.

In order to fend off an army of dead you have to become a high-skilled zombie hunter!

Can you survive the zombies and become a high skilled zombie hunter?

-----------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

Press A - To move front

Press S - To move back

Press A - To move left

Press D - To move right

Press SPACE - For Jumping

Press C - For Crouching

Press 1 - For Axe

Press 2 - For Revolver

Press 3 - For Shotgun

Press 4 - For Assault Rifle

Press 5 - For Wooden Spear

Pres 6 - For Wooden Bow

-----------------------------------------------------------------

Also note that this is a PC game and you will have to extract the files once the game is downloaded into a folder and then enjoy the game!
